isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING LIGHT SYSTEMS - DESCRIPTION - DAYTIME RUNNING LIGHTS (DRL) RELAY WIRING-CANADA

svcproc.title: DAYTIME RUNNING LIGHTS (DRL) RELAY WIRING-CANADA
svcproc.para: This circuit consists of two relays and a park brake switch. It is used to provide a Canadian Daytime Running Lights system. It runs the headlights at a reduced brightness during the day to allow for greater vehicle visibility. The reduced brightness provides an extended bulb life.
